text: III liga, group A was one of 8 groups of III liga, the 4th level of Polish football league system. The group was created in 2008/2009 season and existed until the end of 2015/16. The teams from Łódź and Masovian voivodeships took part in the competition. In season 2016/17 the group was merged with group B to form III liga, group I. == Season 2008/09 == Final tablehttp://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga3824.html {|class="toccolours" style="margin:
